titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building in Miami, Florida, as the "David W. Dyer Federal Justice Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10917-10918)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Designates the Federal building at 99 Northeast Fourth Street, Miami, Florida, as the David W. Dyer Federal Justice Building.
